purpose: Main landing page component that serves as the home page of the application, composing various sections to create a complete page layout

functions.name: Index
functions.core_logic: Renders a vertical stack of landing page sections wrapped in a min-height screen container

key_points: Acts as the main index/home page of the application
Follows a typical landing page structure with header, hero, features, pricing, and footer
Uses component composition pattern to build the page from smaller components
All components are imported from the @/components directory using path aliasing

patterns: Component composition pattern for building complex UI from smaller parts
Functional component using arrow function syntax
Default export pattern for page components
Path aliasing with @/ for cleaner imports
issues: No error boundaries to handle potential component failures
No loading states if any child components require data fetching
No SEO meta tags or page title management
Could benefit from lazy loading for performance optimization
No accessibility landmarks or semantic HTML structure beyond div wrapper
